ProjectsArray.Title: Project One
ProjectsArray.About: In this project, I created a job application form that adapts its prerequisites based on the chosen job category.

ProjectsArray.Title: Project Two
ProjectsArray.About: For this project, I created a homepage that showcases a list of featured freelances, complete with reviews and an option to view more or fewer listings.

ProjectsArray.Title: Project Three
ProjectsArray.About: For this project, I developed a personal website that fulfilled all the specified design requirements.

ProjectsArray.Title: Project Four
ProjectsArray.About: I designed a login and registration page for the Devlink web application, which includes a database to store user information.
